alert.note: Alert for Orange County Coastal; San Diego County Coastal Areas (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued November 27 at 8:46AM PST until November 27 at 10:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Morning high tide today near 6.6 ft combined with elevated surf will present a threat of minor tidal overflow. * WHERE...San Diego County Coastal Areas and Orange County Coastal Areas. * WHEN...Through 10 AM today. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding of low-lying beach parking lots and boardwalks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...High tide at La Jolla was 6.57 ft at 8:06 AM today. High tide at Newport Beach was 6.62 ft at 8:10 AM today.
info.instruction: Potential for flooding of beach parking lots near the morning high tides Monday.

area.areaDesc: Orange County Coastal; San Diego County Coastal Areas
